home.meta_title: Bogus Skill: Explore the World of Fruitmaster Manga & Anime
home.meta_description: Dive into the thrilling universe of Bogus Skill. Read manga, watch anime, and join our passionate community!
home.h2: Welcome to the World of Bogus Skill
home.description: 『外れスキル《木の実マスター》 ～スキルの実（食べたら死ぬ）を無限に食べられるようになった件について～』

hero.title: INTRODUCTION
hero.subtitle: 《Fruitmaster》
hero.description: In a world where consuming "Bogus Skill Fruits" grants special abilities...
hero.story_line1: A young adventurer named Light, aiming to become the strongest, obtained...
hero.story_line2: A seemingly useless bogus skill that turned wood fruits into the «Fruitmaster».
hero.story_line3: "bogus Skill Fruits" must be eaten again to maintain their power, making them irreplaceable.
hero.story_line4: Meanwhile, his childhood friend Ray, who promised to "become an adventurer together,"
hero.story_line5: Has reached the highest S-rank in history, creating a huge gap between them.
hero.story_line6: One day, as Light lives his peaceful farming life,
hero.story_line7: He accidentally consumes a second "Skill Fruit"—
hero.reveal_text: Light, who survived what should have been fatal, discovers the true power of «Fruitmaster».
hero.power_text: It was the ability to eat "bogus Skill Fruits" infinitely!
hero.cheat_text: A hyper-cheat that adds abilities with each consumption!!
hero.twist_text: The lowest-ranked bogus skill was actually the strongest!!!
hero.epic_conclusion: The success fantasy of a man told he couldn't become an adventurer begins now...!

skills.title: Bogus Skill Compendium
skills.subtitle: Known BogusSkill Effects
skills.description: In this world, consuming Bogus Skill Fruits grants various unique abilities. Here are some of the known important Bogus skills:

skills.name: Fruitmaster
skills.description: Initially considered a useless farming Bogus skill that accelerates fruit growth and increases yield. However, it also grants the holder immunity to Bogus Skill Fruit toxicity, allowing them to safely consume multiple bogus Skill Fruits and gain multiple abilities.

skills.name: Swordmaster
skills.description: Greatly enhances the holder's attack power and provides magic resistance when wielding a sword. This powerful combat bogus skill gives the wielder a significant advantage in battle.

skills.name: Appraisal
skills.description: Allows the holder to view information about target's characteristics,bogus skills, and other attributes, providing insight into both allies' and enemies' capabilities. This bogus skill is highly practical in both combat and daily life.

skills.name: Super Refinement
skills.description: Enables the holder to forge metals into desired properties through hammering, suitable for crafting powerful weapons and equipment. It is a key bogus skill for creating legendary-grade equipment.

skills.name: Necromancy
skills.description: A forbidden bogus kill that allows the holder to control the dead or undead creatures. While powerful, using this bogus skill comes with a heavy mental burden.

skills.name: Book Reading
skills.description: Enables the holder to view any written information, even hidden or encrypted content. Particularly useful for gathering intelligence and deciphering ancient documents.

skills.name: Healing
skills.description: Grants the holder the ability to heal wounds and cure diseases, used for supporting allies or self-recovery. An indispensable bogus skill for dangerous adventures.

skills.name: Fire Control
skills.description: Allows the holder to generate and control fire for attacks or other purposes. The temperature and range of the flames can be adjusted based on the user's proficiency.

skills.name: Invisibility
skills.description: Enables the holder to become invisible for a certain period, avoiding detection or used for surprise attacks. The duration of complete invisibility depends on the user's mana reserves.

broadcast.title: Broadcast Information
broadcast.description: The anime adaptation of "Bogus Skill: Fruitmaster" (Hazure Skill 'Kinomi Master' Skill no Mi (Tabetara Shinu) wo Mugen ni Taberareru You ni Natta Ken ni Tsuite) has been confirmed to begin airing in January 2025.
broadcast.origin: Originally from the novel posting site "Shousetsuka ni Narou," this work tells the success fantasy of a boy aiming to become the greatest adventurer in history.

footer.description: Discover the exciting world of Bogus Skill through manga, novels, and anime

light.name: Light
light.description: A young boy who has dreamed of becoming an adventurer since childhood. He received the 'Fruitmaster'bogus skill, which is considered useless in combat, and makes a living as a farmer selling fruits. Despite this, he persistently continues his sword training. Initially disappointed with this skill that only accelerates fruit growth and increases yield, he accidentally consumes a second 'Skill Fruit' and discovers he can gain additional abilities and poison resistance—a cheat-level advantage.

lena.name: Lena
lena.description: A girl who possesses the 'Swordmaster' bogus skill, which greatly enhances her attack power and magic resistance when wielding a sword. She promised her childhood friend Light to become adventurers together but was taken to the Holy City after being recognized as a once-in-a-decade prodigy. She is cheerful and warm-hearted, showing extraordinary talent by becoming an S-rank adventurer faster than anyone in history. Though she's a member of the S-rank party 'Sacred,' she harbors doubts about their methods and atmosphere.

ayla.name: Ayla
ayla.description: A young girl entrusted to Light's care by the village chief. Despite living in poverty, she never complains and works diligently, sharing daily life responsibilities with Light. After accidentally consuming a 'Skill Fruit,' she gained the 'Appraisal' skill, allowing her to identify items' characteristics and abilities.

monica.name: Monica
monica.description: A bogusskilled blacksmith renowned as a legendary craftsman. She possesses the 'Super Refinement'bogus skill, allowing her to alter metal properties through forging at will. Due to a certain incident, she has stopped crafting swords.

dratena.name: Dratena
dratena.description: A mysterious girl belonging to the 'Black Swan' party. She wields the forbidden 'Necromancy'bogus skill, allowing her to control the dead and undead creatures at will.

inspector.name: Holy Maiden
inspector.description: The director of the Adventurers' Guild Inspection Bureau. Responsible for overseeing adventurers'bogus skills, ranks, and team situations while maintaining guild order. As the head of the Inspection Bureau, she holds authority equal to the guild president and can make decisions for all guild departments. She also oversees the distribution of 'Skill Fruits,' allocating approximately 1,000 annually.

investigator.name: Flower Hat
investigator.description: The director of the Adventurers' Guild Research Bureau. Responsible for studying monster ecology, distribution, and terrain. She possesses the 'Book Reading' skill, allowing her to read any information written on paper.

security.name: Tiger Beard
security.description: The director of the Adventurers' Guild Security Bureau. Responsible for maintaining security in the Holy City and its surrounding areas. Confident in his combat abilities and strength, known for his distinctive 'Gahaha!' laugh.

finance.name: Grave Keeper
finance.description: The director of the Adventurers' Guild Finance Bureau. Manages quest rewards and guild finances. Very strict about rules and regulations, sometimes imposing fines as disciplinary measures.
